document.full_text: with three carmakers vying for a $1 billion contract to supply new york city with new taxis, mayor michael bloomberg on friday said the choice will be based on safety, reliability and passengers' convenience.
document.title: nyc mayor: nice if taxis brooklyn-made, not crucial
lines_and_colors: with three carmakers vying for a $1 billion contract to supply new york city with new taxis, mayor michael bloomberg on friday said the choice will be based on safety, reliability and passengers' convenience.
